New Records: Virat Kohli got his first international ton in nearly 3 years
Bhuvneshwar Kumar took career-best figures of 5/4
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 122 off 61 balls
Bhuvneshwar Kumar wiped out the Afghanistan top order
Dinesh Karthik bowled the last over of India's campaign
Pre-Game Insights: The match was a dead-rubber in the Asia Cup
Rohit Sharma, Hardik Pandya, and Yuzvendra Chahal were rested
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli demonstrated that he is batting at his best
The wait for his 71st international hundred ended after 1020 days
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan's bowlers looked jaded after their emotionally-charged match against Pakistan
Kohli's innings had one blemish when he was dropped on 28 by Ibrahim Zadran
